00025 #include "MsqDebug.hpp"
00026 
00027 #include <stdio.h>
00028 #include <stdlib.h>
00029 #include <stdarg.h>
00030 #include <string.h>
00031 
00032 namespace MESQUITE_NS
00033 {
00034 
00035 /* IMPORTANT: Be careful to initialize the InitializeFlags object
00036               *LAST* as it will access the other static data. */
00037 
00038 std::vector<std::ostream*> MsqDebug::streams;
00039 std::vector<bool> MsqDebug::flags;
00040 
00041 #ifdef MSQ_ENABLE_DEBUG
00042 static void parse_flag_string( const char* str, bool flag_val )
00043 {
00044   char* s = strdup(str);
00045   const char delim[] = ";,";
00046   for (const char* p = strtok( s, delim ); p; p = strtok( 0, delim ) ) {
00047     int beg, end;
00048     switch (sscanf( p, "%u - %u", &beg, &end )) {
00049       case 1:
00050         end = beg;
00051         // fall through 
00052       case 2:
00053         for ( ; beg <= end; ++beg)
00054           MsqDebug::set( beg, flag_val );
00055         break;
00056     }
00057   }
00058   free( s );
00059 }
00060 
00061 MsqDebug::InitializeFlags::InitializeFlags( )
00062 {
00063   const unsigned flag_array[] = { MSQ_ENABLE_DEBUG, 0 };
00064   size_t length = sizeof(flag_array) / sizeof(unsigned) - 1;
00065   while (length > 0)
00066     MsqDebug::set( flag_array[--length], true );
00067   
00068   const char* envstr = getenv( "MESQUITE_DEBUG" );
00069   if (envstr) 
00070     parse_flag_string( envstr, true );
00071   envstr = getenv( "MESQUITE_NO_DEBUG" );
00072   if (envstr) 
00073     parse_flag_string( envstr, false );
00074 }
00075 #else
00076 MsqDebug::InitializeFlags::InitializeFlags( ) {}
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 MsqDebug::InitializeFlags MsqDebug::init;
00080 
00081 
00082 bool MsqDebug::get( unsigned flag )
00083 {
00084   return flag < flags.size() && flags[flag];
00085 }
00086 
00087 void MsqDebug::set( unsigned flag, bool state )
00088 {
00089   if (state)
00090   {
00091     if (flag >= flags.size())
00092     {
00093       flags.resize(flag+1);
00094     }
00095     flags[flag] = true;
00096   }
00097   else
00098   {
00099     if (flag < flags.size())
00100       flags[flag] = false;
00101   }
00102 }
00103 
00104 void MsqDebug::disable_all()
00105 {
00106   flags.clear();
00107 }
00108 
00109 std::ostream& MsqDebug::get_stream( unsigned flag )
00110 {
00111   if (flag < streams.size())
00112     return *streams[flag];
00113   else
00114     return std::cout;
00115 }
00116 
00117 void MsqDebug::set_stream( unsigned flag, std::ostream& stream )
00118 {
00119   if (flag >= streams.size())
00120   {
00121     size_t old_size = streams.size();
00122     streams.resize( flag );
00123     for (unsigned i = old_size; i < flag; ++i)
00124       streams[i] = &std::cout;
00125   }
00126   streams[flag] = &stream;
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 void MsqDebug::FormatPrinter::print( const char* format, ... ) const
00131 {
00132   if (!MsqDebug::get( myFlag ))
00133     return;
00134   
00135   char buffer[512];
00136   
00137 #if defined(HAVE_VSNPRINTF)
00138   va_list args;
00139   va_start( args, format );
00140   vsnprintf( buffer, sizeof(buffer), format, args );
00141   va_end( args );
00142 #elif defined(HAVE__VSNPRINTF)
00143   va_list args;
00144   va_start( args, format );
00145   _vsnprintf( buffer, sizeof(buffer), format, args );
00146   va_end( args );
00147 #elif defined(HAVE_VSPRINTF) 
00148   va_list args;
00149   va_start( args, format );
00150   vsprintf( buffer, format, args );
00151   va_end( args );
00152 #else
00153   strncpy( buffer, format, sizeof(buffer) );
00154   buffer[sizeof(buffer)-1] = '\0';
00155 #endif
00156 
00157   MsqDebug::get_stream( myFlag ) << buffer;
00158 }
00159 
00160 }
